message:
Yes, I agreed. But the twist is that I am hoping to spawn off multiple task to process the results.

I have posted a question on stackoverflow -

([http://stackoverflow.com/qu...](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34619062/chaining-tasks-with-continuation-and-run-parallel-task-afterward) "http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34619062/chaining-tasks-with-continuation-and-run-parallel-task-afterward)")

. But, I have yet come across a viable solution. It's rare to meet an expert on this subject, so I am curious on what you think I should do.

Thank you.
